create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_1: Metal Tunnels can be used to cover up your belts
create.ponder.andesite_tunnel.text_2: Whenever an Metal Tunnel has connections to the sides...
create.ponder.belt_casing.text_1: Brass or Metal Casing can be used to decorate Mechanical Belts
create.ponder.brass_funnel.text_1: Metal Funnels can only ever extract single items.
create.ponder.cogwheel_casing.text_1: Brass or Metal Casing can be used to decorate Cogwheels
create.ponder.shaft_casing.text_1: Brass or Metal Casing can be used to decorate Shafts
item.create.netherite_diving_helmet.tool: Together with a _Blue Steel Backtank_, this can protect you from _extreme heat_. To be effective, _Legs and Feet_ have to be covered in a _Blue Steel Diving Equipment_, too.
